ComicInfo.Summary:
Dynamite Does It Again! Following the smash debut of our introductory #0 issue, and picking up right where the closing of that issue left off, Dynamite presents HIGHLANDER #1!
Writers Michael Avon ("Red Sonja") Oeming with Brandon ("Battlestar Galactica: Tom Zarek ") Jerwa are again joined by the incomparable Lee ("Red Sonja") Moder as they tell a tale pitting the Immortal Highlander -- Connor MacLeod -- against the dread Kurgan in post-war Berlin! This opening story arc, and all future storylines have been written under the guidance of Highlander expert David Abramowitz and are sure to please and thrill legions of Highlander fans both old and new! Each issue also features modern action with flashbacks to the past - the same story structures which built the history for the films and television shows!
Cover artists for issue #1 include Tony (Conan Cover Artist) Harris, Dave (Star Wars/ Premiere Fantasy painter) Dorman and Gabriele (Secret War) Dell'Otto - shipping in equal ratio! Look for more all-star cover talent on future issues, including Billy Tan, Stephen Sadowski, Mel Rubi, Cammo with Richard Isanove and more from Tony Harris and Dave Dorman!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Gabriel Dell'Otto | 1 | B | Cover B | Dave Dorman | 4 | C | Cover C | Tony Harris | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive Sketch Variant Cover | Tony Harris | 3 | RRP | Retailer Roundtable Program Edition Cover | Gabriel Dell'Otto | 2 |
